Crack: ALI213

Game information:

Welcome to the 3 Risen! World, forgotten by the gods and the Titans
war-torn world where the threat comes from the earth itself. You -
a young warrior, get a kick out of shadows, deprived you of the soul.
You need to hit the road to get back what was lost in the darkness
and spreading across the world. You are not alone in their struggle:
exiled mages can be powerful allies. But in order to get their help,
you need to find them refuge on the island of Taranis, known as
Thunder Island. Here magicians, under the protection of guards,
went deep into the bowels of the Taranis in order to find the
crystals filled with magical powers. Will you join the guards,
to seek help from the mages? Or your choice will fall on other
guild? Recognize that the world is Risen 3 and fulfill your destiny!
As in the case of the cult series of Gothic, Risen is a key element
of the bright world and freedom in his study. World Ã‚Â«Risen 3: Titan
LordsÃ‚Â» diverse, original, full of life and is able to give the
player a unique experience of classic role-playing game.


Game Features:


Freedom. Explore the world completely free, handle the job at your
convenience. Tasks can be executed in different ways and the result
will be different. Go through the game and develop your character
the way you want.

Study. Discover new tasks and characters as they move in a diverse
world Risen 3: Titan Lords. In the quaint medieval towns, damp and
dismal mines, supernatural world of shadows - all offers countless
opportunities for research

A new combat system. Introducing amended combat system with new
techniques and movements, bringing even more variety in the battle.
The magic is back! Magic crystals returned, bringing with them new
destructive combat capabilities. Master the elements lightning,
fire and ice. Crush your enemies, or use a variety of auxiliary
magic skills to facilitate your journey. The choice is yours!
Guilds and factions. Join one of the three guilds unlike anything.
Each of them will offer its own unique equipment, skills and tasks
that allow you to completely different ways to achieve the goal.
Expand the plans of smaller communities, trying to change the balance
of power in their favor. Be careful with those you trust - someone
they can just pretend to be your friend, in pursuit
of their own interests insidious.


Repack Features:

Risen 3: Titan Lords First Edition
Version of the game - v1.0.90
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:

Misty Island;
Rise of the shorties;
Clothing traveler
